text: Horticulture is the practical botany of gardens. It includes both decorative and vegetable aspects of gardens. A horticulturist is a person who works and conducts research in the science and skill of growing flowers, fruits, vegetables or ornamental plants. Plant breeding is an important part of horticulture. ==Related pages== * Arboriculture * Gardening Category:Botany Category:Gardening
title: Horticulture
